title: Implications of Atrial Fibrillation for Guideline-Directed Therapy in Patients With Heart Failure: JACC State-of-the-Art Review
authors: Joshua D. Newman, Eileen O’Meara, Michael Böhm, Gianluigi Savarese, Patricia R. Kelly, Orly Vardeny, Larry A. Allen, Patrizio Lancellotti, Stephen S. Gottlieb, Zainab Samad, Alanna A.
